value:
$WmMPID_バアトル,ch02_02_Bartr_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I can't let any of you past me!
Prepare yourselves!$k$p

$WmMPID_フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I want to become stronger...so don't
hold back! It's time to fight!$k$p

$WmMPID_ホークアイ,ch03_01_Hawkeye_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am Hawkeye. My only option is to
fight so that I may fulfill my destiny.$k$p

$WmMPID_ファ,ch02_06_Fa_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You can't get by me! Come on, let's
play!$k$p

$WmMPID_ソフィーヤ,ch02_04_Sofiya_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Fae? Fae, where are you? Oh...
Where did she run off to now?$k$p

$WmMPID_ナーシェン,ch02_12_Nacien_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am stronger than anyone, and more
handsome as well... Tremble in fear
and kneel before me!$k$p
